idea-plugin.name: DEV Tracker
idea-plugin.description:
Development Time Tracker

The Development Time Tracker plugin helps developers monitor and manage the time spent on projects. Whether you are tracking productivity, working towards better time management, or simply curious about your work patterns, this plugin offers a convenient way to keep an eye on your development hours.

Features:

  • Track time spent on each project automatically.
  • Receive reminders when you’ve worked continuously for a set amount of time.
  • View total time worked on individual projects or across all open projects.
  • Simple and non-intrusive notifications to keep you informed.
  • Customizable settings for reminders and notifications.

Why use Development Time Tracker?
Stay aware of how much time you’re dedicating to your work and improve your time management skills.
